attributes.action: stop bpl (broadband over power lines interference ) for cb radios
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop bpl (broadband over power lines interference)  for cb radios and to raise the uk legal limit of 4 watt to 1o watt fm the bpl blocks main channel from chanel 1 to 31 and stops the radio comunication working
